input_email_body:
Subject: Subject: Sudden Disappearance of Digital Campaign Metrics

Dear Customer Support, 

I am writing to report a sudden disappearance of our digital campaign metrics My name is Carlos Mendoza.. This issue may be related to an API integration problem. I have attempted to resolve it by restarting the analytics tool and verifying the data connectors, but to no avail. I kindly request you to investigate this and provide a resolution. The missing metrics are essential for our marketing team to assess campaign performance. If you require any additional information from me, please do not hesitate to ask. I have ensured that the tool's settings are correct. I look forward to your prompt response You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. Thank you for your time and assistance. 

Sincerely, [Your Name]
